CARDINAL . NORP The relevant domestic provisions governing the imposition of other “ preventive measures ” ( środki zapobiegawcze ) , inter alia , bail , are covered by LAW of LAW , which entered into force on DATE .

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of the LAW provides that detention shall not be imposed if another preventive measure ( for example , bail ) is considered to be adequate . Pursuant to LAW , bail in the form of cash , securities or by way of a charge on property can be deposited by the accused or by another person . Determination of the amount , form and the relevant methods for the payment of bail should be made by a decision , having regard to the financial situation of the accused and , as the case may be , that of another party depositing bail , as well as to the assessment of the damage which may have been caused by the offence concerned and to the character of the offence .
